name: Ice Delivery (partyvaper)
description:
Ice Delivery

How many boxes can you load into ship during given time?

Remember, you're a penguin on ice! You won't slip much, but what about those boxes sliding all over the place?

Controls: 

Movement: AWSD

Game made during the Trijam #189: The 3 hour game jam in 3,5 hours, by single dev and single graphical artist!

The theme was "Push & Pull", and you have to push around boxes on ice!
